title: In 'Me And Earl And The Dying Girl,' Director Pays Homage To His Mentors
teaser: In the film, two teenagers — who make parodies of classic films — are tasked with making a film for a severely ill classmate. NPR's Audie Cornish speaks with the director, Alfonso Gomez-Rejon.
